name: Koonk Technologies Pvt Ltd
tag_list: politics, political-forum, start-up, website, youth, indian, news-agency
overview:
One of the fastest growing political portal online. They have generated over 21 thousands followers in a period of less than 5 months from our founding.

Raajneeti is all about the Indian Political System,they go by the by-line,”Decoding the Truth of Indian Politics”.

It is a news website,which has a repository of information regarding raajneeti-from history to opinion to profiles and polls-all rolled into one. If one requires to find out anything about the Indian politics-they should pay the site a visit.

They have a large collection of prolific political writers.

It is an interactive site,wherein a reader actually gets an opportunity to form an opinion. They do not have pieces that are coloured by judgement.

They are dynamic in nature and kep introducing new sections that keep the users’ interest alive.

It is the only place wherein one can find everything related to the Indian Political Scene in one place.

They are not associated with any media house or political party.
